isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - SUN SHADE

svcsubproc.title: Install Sun Shade on Daycab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 17
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position sun shade (Item 5) at sun shade mounting bracket (Item 7) and connect sun shade connector (Item 12) to wiring harness connector (Item 10) coming from wiring harness hole (Item 11) in sun shade mounting bracket.

Position sun shade (Item 5) on the sun shade mounting bracket (Item 7) bonded to daycab roof (Item 8). Install three hex flanged head mounting screws (Item 6) through clearance light openings and attach sun shade to sun shade mounting bracket. Tighten to 34 to 38 Lbf-ft (46 to 52 N•m).

Position right and left side sun shade clearance lights (Items 2 and 3) and center sun shade clearance light (Item 4) onto sun shade (Item 5) and install two self-tapping screws (Item 1) for each clearance light, attaching them to sun shade. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).

svcsubproc.title: Install Sun Shade on Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 18
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position sun shade (Item 5) at three sun shade mounting brackets (Item 7) and connect sun shade connector (Item 13) to wiring harness connector (Item 11) coming from wiring harness hole (Item 12) in center sun shade mounting bracket.

Position sun shade (Item 5) on the three sun shade mounting brackets (Item 7) bonded to sleeper cab roof (Item 9). Install three hex flanged head mounting screws (Item 6) through clearance light openings and attach sun shade to three sun shade mounting brackets. Tighten to 34 to 38 Lbf-ft (46 to 52 N•m).

Position right and left side sun shade clearance lights (Items 2 and 3) and center sun shade clearance light (Item 4) onto sun shade (Item 5) and install two self-tapping screws (Item 1) for each clearance light, attaching them to sun shade. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
